blocks.name: zlm0
blocks.content: Zero of a ` ZZ ` -module. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 8-Nov-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm zlm0(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(c0, cfv(c0g, c1))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(czlm, c2))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(c0g, c2))
} = {
  eqtri(c0, cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(c0g, c2))
  mptru(wceq(cfv(c0g, c2), cfv(c0g, c1)))
  grpidpropd(hs0, hs1, c2, c1, cfv(cbs, c2), wtru)
  a1i(wtru, wceq(cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c2)))
  a1i(wtru, wceq(cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c1)))
  zlmbas(cfv(cbs, c2), c1, c2)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c2))
  oveqd(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c1), wa(wtru, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2)))))
  a1i(wa(wtru, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2)))), wceq(cfv(cplusg, c2), cfv(cplusg, c1)))
  zlmplusg(cfv(cplusg, c2), c1, c2)
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c2))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c2))
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, c2))
  diff.hs0.w(wtru)
  diff.hs1.w(wtru)
}

  fveq2d(cds, c3, co(co(c0, csts, cop(cfv(csca, cnx), zring)), csts, cop(cfv(cvsca, cnx), cfv(cmg, c0))), wcel(c0, c1))
  zlmval(c0, c1, c3, cfv(cmg, c0))

  eqtri(cfv(cds, c0), cfv(cds, co(co(c0, csts, cop(cfv(csca, cnx), zring)), csts, cop(cfv(cvsca, cnx), cfv(cmg, c0)))), cfv(cds, co(c0, csts, cop(cfv(csca, cnx), zring))))
  setsnid(cds, c0, cfv(csca, cnx), zring)
  mpbir(wne(cfv(cds, cnx), cfv(csca, cnx)), wne(cdc(nat1, nat2), nat5))
  gtneii(cdc(nat1, nat2), nat5)
  5re()
  declti(nat5, nat1, nat2)
  5nn0()
  5lt10()
  neeq12i(cfv(cds, cnx), cfv(csca, cnx), cdc(nat1, nat2), nat5)
  scandx()
  setsnid(cds, co(c0, csts, cop(cfv(csca, cnx), zring)), cfv(cvsca, cnx), cfv(cmg, c0))
  dsid()
  mpbir(wne(cfv(cds, cnx), cfv(cvsca, cnx)), wne(cdc(nat1, nat2), nat6))
  gtneii(cdc(nat1, nat2), nat6)
  6re()
  declti(nat6, nat1, nat2)
  1nn()
  2nn0()
  6nn0()
  6lt10()

thm zlmnm(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cfv(cnm, c3)))

  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))

  zlmplusg(cfv(cplusg, c0), c3, c0)
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c0))

blocks.name: zhmnrg
blocks.content: The ` ZZ ` -module built from a normed ring is also a normed ring. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 8-Nov-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm zhmnrg(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cnrg), wcel(c1, cnrg))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(czlm, c0))
} = {
  ibi(wcel(c0, cnrg), wcel(c1, cnrg))
  3bitr4g(wcel(c0, cnrg), wcel(c0, cnrg), wcel(c1, cnrg), wa(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(cfv(cnm, c0), cfv(cabv, c0))), wa(wcel(c1, cngp), wcel(cfv(cnm, c1), cfv(cabv, c1))))
  anbi12d(wcel(c0, cnrg), wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(cfv(cnm, c0), cfv(cabv, c0)), wcel(c1, cngp), wcel(cfv(cnm, c1), cfv(cabv, c1)))
  3bitr4g(wcel(c0, cnrg), wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, cngp), w3a(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c0, cms), wss(ccom(cfv(cnm, c0), cfv(csg, c0)), cfv(cds, c0))), w3a(wcel(c1, cgrp), wcel(c1, cms), wss(ccom(cfv(cnm, c1), cfv(csg, c1)), cfv(cds, c1))))
  3anbi123d(wcel(c0, cnrg), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c0, cms), wss(ccom(cfv(cnm, c0), cfv(csg, c0)), cfv(cds, c0)), wcel(c1, cgrp), wcel(c1, cms), wss(ccom(cfv(cnm, c1), cfv(csg, c1)), cfv(cds, c1)))
  grppropd(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c0), wcel(c0, cnrg))
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cplusg, c1), wcel(c0, cnrg), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0))))
  mspropd(c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c0), wcel(c0, cnrg))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cnrg), wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0)))
  reseq1d(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0)), cfv(cds, c1), wcel(c0, cnrg))
  topnpropd(c0, c1, wcel(c0, cnrg))
  zlmtset(c0, cnrg, cfv(cts, c0), c1)
  eqid(cfv(cts, c0))
  sseq12d(ccom(cfv(cnm, c0), cfv(csg, c0)), cfv(cds, c0), ccom(cfv(cnm, c1), cfv(csg, c1)), cfv(cds, c1), wcel(c0, cnrg))
  coeq12d(cfv(cnm, c0), cfv(csg, c0), cfv(cnm, c1), cfv(csg, c1), wcel(c0, cnrg))
  grpsubpropd(c0, c1, wcel(c0, cnrg))
  zlmds(c0, cnrg, cfv(cds, c0), c1)
  isngp(c0, cfv(cnm, c0), cfv(csg, c0), cfv(cds, c0))
  eqid(cfv(csg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cds, c0))
  isngp(c1, cfv(cnm, c1), cfv(csg, c1), cfv(cds, c1))
  eqid(cfv(csg, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cds, c1))

  zlmnm(c0, cnrg, cfv(cnm, c0), c1)
  abvpropd2(c0, c1, wcel(c0, cnrg))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cnrg), wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1)))
  zlmbas(cfv(cbs, c0), c1, c0)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cnrg), wceq(cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cplusg, c1)))
  zlmplusg(cfv(cplusg, c0), c1, c0)
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cnrg), wceq(cfv(cmulr, c0), cfv(cmulr, c1)))
  zlmmulr(cfv(cmulr, c0), c1, c0)
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, c0))

  eqid(cfv(cabv, c0))
  isnrg(c1, cfv(cnm, c1), cfv(cabv, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cnm, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cabv, c1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

  anbi12d(c0 ∈ NrmRing, c0 ∈ NrmGrp, (norm ` c0)∈(AbsVal ` c0), c1 ∈ NrmGrp, (norm ` c1)∈(AbsVal ` c1))
  3bitr4g(c0 ∈ NrmRing, c0 ∈ NrmGrp, c1 ∈ NrmGrp, (c0 ∈ Grp ∧ c0 ∈ MetSp ∧((norm ` c0)∘(-g ` c0))⊆(dist ` c0)), (c1 ∈ Grp ∧ c1 ∈ MetSp ∧((norm ` c1)∘(-g ` c1))⊆(dist ` c1)))
